body:
Do you want to see how this foolish Girl regret her life choices because the consequences of her actions? Want to see how Karma can be ruthless sometimes? Want to see how successful the MC compared to that scumbag of a boyfriend (soon husband) she chose over the MC in social life?

Well look no further! Check the link!

Dramus practically shows that the relationship between the Fuckboy and Akina is nothing more than a form of escapism on her part (Akina). Therefore, it´s somewhat stupid to me that things will end with Akina being <victorious> when the real consequence will be that such a relationship will fails.

Do you really believe in love,like, for real?

They're not officially together, but as someone who's experienced something similar. It's the same in my case we did it to each other. I started it though. We went to prom as friends and I started flirting with other girls and even making out with one. "There's no way she likes me anyway." I thought. Even though we hung out every fucking day! Oh god! I really want to beat the shit out of my past self.

We even hooked up later in life and she told me she loved me. After she was in a car accident. "When I thought I would die. I thought of you. I love you." When someone says that with such genuine emotions. It's the best feeling in the world. My reaction? I grilled her about exactly what happened. Then lectured her about the things I thought she did wrong. A genuine piece of shit right there. The hell was wrong with me!? She broke up with me the next day. Can't blame her. This story really hits home for me. Whelp I feel better~

The ending will apparently in the second part of the female side story. The author is still indecisive whether to give a happy or bad ending and said he hasnt drawn the ending yet. I don't think we need the heroine's point of view next if we got tatsuya and basically mc's pov. Heroine's pov is probably some shit you'd be able to guess from reading other ntr doujinshi. He did mention just gangbanging or dping his ex-gf, but this still isn't ntr. If he's decides to share her with his friends maybe rape? But he definitely cucked the mc.
Ntr would be cucking while said target is already in a relationship and the "target/victim" dislikes/hates it(basically cheating, but not of your own will and can end with the victim liking it or not). Basically cheating(like i said you'd have to be in a relationship), but rape or not because u want/like it(bc blackmailing into consent messes with the definition part of willingly) and some frosting of basically stockholm syndrome.
